EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - Los Angeles
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Los Angeles. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—Los Angeles, CA Monday, November 28, 2016
8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/losangeles]]>
Location: Real Office Centers, Santa Monica <[[http://www.realofficecenters.com/]]> 604 Arizona Avenue / 3rd Floor Santa Monica CA 90401 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0193967,-118.4966953,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2a4cec2c92a97:0x3d06ccbca95fb3b6!8m2!3d34.0193967!4d-118.4945013]]>
Parking: There is no parking at ROC, plase see the list of nearby parking lots here <[[https://drive.google.com/a/pivotal.io/file/d/0B2b61-y16w-LREhFTGpLWWdHTld5MjZ6SXRkRmF5OWNRSTlj/view?usp=sharing]]>.
Questions? Contact Kathryn Efird at kefird@pivotal.io <[[mailto:kefird@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
